trans-unit.resname: DDQ·8 | Eerie Interlude | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile any number of target creatures you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 放逐任意数量目标由你操控的生物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将所放逐之牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置目标由对手操控的生物。

trans-unit.source: Delirium — At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, tap target creature that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 躁狂～在每位对手的维持开始时，若你坟墓场中牌的类别有四种或更多，横置目标由该牌手操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: DDQ·28 | Pore Over the Pages | Card Name
DDQ·28 | Pore Over the Pages | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw three cards, untap up to two lands, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌，重置至多两个地，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: DDQ·41 | Mindwrack Demon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
DDQ·41 | Mindwrack Demon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill four cards.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将你牌库顶的四张牌置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: DDQ·41 | Mindwrack Demon | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Delirium — At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 4 life unless there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 躁狂～在你的维持开始时，除非你坟墓场中牌的类别有四种或更多，否则你失去4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: DDQ·42 | Compelling Deterrence | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card if you control a Zombie.
trans-unit.target: 将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。然后如果你操控灵俑，则该牌手弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: DDQ·64 | Tooth Collector | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标由对手操控的生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: DDQ·64 | Tooth Collector | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Delirium — At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, target creature that player controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 躁狂～在每位对手的维持开始时，若你坟墓场中牌的类别有四种或更多，则目标由该牌手操控的生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。
